website_summaries.verdict: This is simply one of the finest gaming headsets I've ever worn, and the Dolby USB module makes it perfect for PCs that lack a decent audio card.
pros: Nice price for amazingly crisp sound
cons: Lets in too much outside sound
The cans are huge and unwieldy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset because they're extremely comfortable (although the earpieces are square so they can become uncomfortable after a while), they come with the USB Dolby sound card, the sound quality is very high and they're great value for money! The microphone is fine and doesn't require any setting up. The 5.1 surround sound is great They're only £26.99 refurbished and in excellent condition!! I would definitely pick these over any other > £100 headset.
customer_reviews.author: Jake MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant. Very sturdy construction and comfortable to wear over long periods. My previous headset (not by this manufacturer) ended up with a snapped lead but this has excellent shielding so I don't think it will suffer the same fate. Choice of either USB or jack plug fittings and it works with Skype. I have also used this on a mac and PC and it works fine on both. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. D. Savage

customer_reviews.title: These are a very good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: These are a very good quality sound, the surround sound setting aren't quite enveloping I'd hoped but fire a split stereo it's good. They are quit tight on the old noggin & after prolonged use can give a fair sore ear. But I thing the good out ways the bad, unless you really hate having sore ears.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. O'neill

customer_reviews.title: Really nice headphones, but faulty mic already!
customer_reviews.text: After spending alot of time trying to decide between alot of headphones on the morket i decided to go with these. The product is excellent, although the mic is now faulty just 30 days after purchasing. It is lightweight and really comfortable with a velvety sort of material on the rings of the headphones. The sound produced is good, not amazing whilst listening to music but is amazing in game. i was a bit disappointed with the amount of bass produced but it wasn't a big deal. However the mic has become faulty making a buzzing sound constantly. However the plantronics customer support was excellent and a free delivery has been arranged for them to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 3 years for me then the USB adapter park broke. They still work, but I obviously lose the USB controller part, so they don't sound as good as they could. I use a razer megalodon now but i'll keep these as my spares.
customer_reviews.author: MikeM

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics GameCom 777
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset, no complaints from microphone or speakers, not one for "big heads" cos they do get tight, but then that helps the Sound Quality. The USB plug means no dependence on the PC or Laptops poor/no/broken Sound card. Don't forget to change the default sound device in Windows to avoid games getting confused. If you have a good sound card you can plug in the two mini jacks instead.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Meh, get the new one, its better.
customer_reviews.text: Its all right there in the headline. This one isn't very loud and the bass is non-descript. It is comfortable and the build quality is good and its USB with no drivers neded. But its been superceded and its younger brother is just plain better in all but comfort.
customer_reviews.author: S. GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and sounds great. When I first used them, I had to keep sliding them off to make sure that it wasn't the speakers I was hearing it felt that real. I played between the stereo & Dolby Surround settings and haven't changed to stereo since. Very comfortable to wear and the microphone sounds very warm. I'm very happy with my set.
customer_reviews.author: APM Trueman-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, good and clear microphone
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, good and clear microphone. Can be a bit uncomfortable to wear for a while, and the sound isn't bassy enough for me. But for the price it is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Laith Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not great build quality, break easily, cables wear down easy.
customer_reviews.author: J B Mchugh

customer_reviews.title: Good All round affordable gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought the refurb option, and the quality of the product was excellent only one or two minor scratches on the unit. Unit works with Playstation 4 straight out of the box, all be it you will need to play with your sound settings on the console menu. For the price paid the sound quality is excellent (€36 incl. delivery).
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Such comfortable headphones! Ive been using them for about a week now and it is true that they can sit a little tight on your head but after a few days that goes away once they get used to your head. These are great and everyone i know has commented on how clear the microphone is. Really reccomend these!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a year and have no complaints at all. The microphone is very sensitive and has no problems and the headphones are sturdy (I dropped them a few times and nothing it is still in perfect condition).
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: good head set for tropical ears
customer_reviews.text: Good headset in regards to sound quality and how comfortable they are. They only negative is the material around the ear piece is thick fabric and does heat up your ears to irritating tempo.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it it's awesome. best headset ive owned for the pc. It was just a shame they broke near the ear bit which i fixed with superglue and electrical tape. Still best headset ive owned!
customer_reviews.author: James David Haynes

customer_reviews.title: These headsets are the best
customer_reviews.text: Ive never had a problem with these headsets. They have worked every time for me , and they are easily compatible with any device ive used them with.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bland

customer_reviews.title: great headphones
customer_reviews.text: short and sweet - fantastic pair of headphones.. really well made, great quality and foldable mic.
customer_reviews.author: Normski

customer_reviews.title: wonderful seller gr8 piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: did exactly what i needed thank you for a great headset, will recommend to all buyers in the near future
customer_reviews.author: mr johnathan peart

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Used to have this a few years ago, it was incredible. Construction and sound quality are great. It felt very lightweight and comfortable. Seriously great This has been a firm favourite and if I ever want to get a PC gaming headset again will definitely go back to Plantronics based on my experience with the 777. Should say this did actually break within a year for me -don't know why- but it was a refurbished model which I guess explains the length of time it lasted and the price I got it at.
customer_reviews.author: Jai Burlingham

customer_reviews.title: solid and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, especially at the price. They are comfortable, even on my big head. They are clear and bright with reasonable base. Many phones I've tried just aren't loud enough. These are. Build quality is very good and unusually for headphones of this type the Microphone is up to the job. I've not really tested with many games but those I have, are all fine. They can get a little hot if you wear them for hours, so four stars not five.
customer_reviews.author: M. WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: yes oh yes woo hoo
customer_reviews.text: does exactly what i wanted it to do and that's work on my PS3, 360 and PC (for consoles all you need is a 3.5mm extension cable to attach to TV no 7.1 surround sound) great sound and it fits my big head brilliantly. the wire also has a good enough reach so you can sit a couple of meters from the TV at a stretch. all in all a great product and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: N Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Gamecom plantronics 555 5.1 headset
customer_reviews.text: When i took this product outta the box for the first time, there was no sound in the right ear. Strangely, it started working after a bit. Stereo sound when plugged into my x-fi card is excellent. Not quite as good with the provided sound card and so far, the 5.1 is useless on everything i've tested. Trackir Proclip took some persuading to fit on side but with small modifications it is now a very stable platform for the head-tracker. I'd have no trouble recommending this producy if it was a little cheaper. £40 would be a good price. They are significantly better than the creative fatal1ty headset that retails for around £35.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Christopher Iain Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: Having had plantronic b4 i thought i would buy a better headset, sound is crisp and really nice when listening 2 music/film and even good 4 games. 1 downside is the material used on the earphone part, it makes my skin itch but should be better once it has worn down a bit, cable could do with being a bit longer as well. Mic works well with teamspeak and hids away nice when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hodson-walker

customer_reviews.title: Unusable with USB dolby adapter
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Gamecom 777 just 2 days back. Its making loud crackling and hissing noises even at low volume. Its virtually unusable when i use the USB Dolby Adaptor, when i use the analog jacks its much better. But then i dint pay so much to use it as an analog headphone. Sadly this is the worst headphone set i have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Do not work on xbox 360
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering buying this headset for your xbox 360 then save yourself £30 and buy the plantronics gamecon 367. the dolby surround sound card is not compatible with the 360 so I was disappointed when this headset arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Beech33

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I GAVE THESE TO MY 20 YEAR OLD SON FOR CHRISTMAS, HE PLAYS ONLINE GAMES AND WAS VERY HAPPY WITH THEM. THE FIRST TIME HE USED THEM HE SAID THE OTHER PLAYERS THOUGHT HE WAS SOMEHOW CHEATING BECAUSE HE COULD HEAR THINGS COMING BEFORE THEY COULD.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lees

customer_reviews.title: no good for gamers
customer_reviews.text: don't buy these if you want to play and chat on ps3 it can't do it .despite the impression given this no better than bluetooth headset .a total waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: L. saunders

product_meta.title: Plantronics GameCom 777 Dolby Open Ear Gaming Headset
product_meta.description:
Plantronics GameCom 777 Gaming Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone

BOX CONTAINS


Gamecom Headset
Safety Guide
User Guide
feature_bullets: Dolby Headphone technology delivers a 5-channel audio experience
Dolby USB sound card is needed to get the full 5.1 experience
If needed, an analog connection is also provided
Open-ear design keeping you connected to the game and your surroundings
Concealed mic boom (hidden until you’re ready to use it)
Specially designed ear pods to redistribute pressure for maximum comfort
In-line volume and mic-mute controls allowing for easy audio adjustment
Noise-cancelling microphone lets you communicate clearly
Rugged, military-grade design and extra-strength cables make your hardware hardcore

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars102 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
